main.name: Abhi Balijepalli
main.description: Hi, I'm an undergraduate at Oregon State University studying Computer Science. Some of my interests are Full-Stack development and Cloud Security. Feel free to reach out to me :)
main.bio: I grew up in Seattle, WA and I love to climb/boulder. Hit me up if you wanna chat about startups or tech!
main.contactmessage: Contact me if you wanna chat about tech or what I'm up to!

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Refactoring existing legacy code and improving Cisco Umbrella's internal end-to-end testing platform for the Cloud Delivered Firewall Team.

work.title: Founding Engineer
work.description: I designed the web infrastructure of Pondr: which includes Pondr public and Super Admin API, NoSQL database, OAuth authentication, and Dev-Ops

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Created a highly scalable App for restaurant delivery services for enterprises and firms using React-Native, pipelined authentication (OAuth) using Google Firebase console, and implemented Elastic Search from Appbase.io in ReactJS

work.title: Software Team Lead
work.description: Worked with a sub-team of 6 people to create robotics software for an underwater remote operated vehicle to compete in the MATE International challenge, while communicating with the school board to approve funding and expenses.

work.title: Undergraduate Researcher
work.description: Researched and invented an automated glucose pump for diabetic infants using proportional and derivative controllers to predict stable states which communicates with a Dexcom sensor.
